title: WaveSpeed AI - Achieve Perfect Alignment in Your Photos Instantly

hero.heading: Correct Perspective in Your Photos
hero.description: Enter your prompt to automatically adjust the alignment and perspective of your image for stunning results.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Straighten the building, fix the tilt of the image, adjust horizon level...

examples.heading: Before & After Examples
examples.description: Discover the transformative power of AI Perspective Correction and how it can enhance the alignment of your photos.

items.title: Straighten Buildings
items.imageAlt: Example showing building straightened in a photo

items.title: Fix Image Tilt
items.description: Restore balance to your landscapes and portraits for a more pleasing composition.

features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI?
features.description: Our cutting-edge technology delivers flawless perspective adjustments effortlessly.

items.title: Instant Adjustments
items.description: Experience immediate corrections that bring your photos back to professional standards.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No expertise needed. Just upload your image and let the AI handle the perspective corrections.

items.title: Privacy Assured
items.description: All adjustments are made securely in your browser, ensuring your images remain private.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to perfect alignment

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop your image or browse through your files. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: Our AI intelligently analyzes and corrects perspective issues, enhancing the overall composition.

items.title: Download Result
items.description: View the improved image using our comparison slider and download your perfectly aligned photo in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless users who have aligned their photos perfectly with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emma Roberts
items.comment: The perspective correction feature completely transformed my architectural shots. No more slanted lines!

items.name: David Lee

items.name: Chloe Kim
items.comment: I'm impressed by the ease of use. My portraits now look so much more professional!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about AI Perspective Correction

items.title: What types of perspective issues can WaveSpeed correct?
items.description: The AI can adjust for tilt, straighten lines, and correct lens distortion, making it ideal for architecture, landscapes, and product photography.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed completely free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user gets 30 free credits daily, enabling you to enhance numerous images. Additional credits can be earned through challenges and surveys.

items.title: Can I use my edited images commercially?
items.description: Yes, paid subscribers can use edited content for commercial purposes. Free users can utilize corrections for personal projects.

items.title: How does the privacy protection work?
items.description: Processing occurs locally in your browser with advanced technology, ensuring that your original images are never uploaded or stored, guaranteeing complete security.

footer.heading: Ready to Perfect Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and see the stunning results for yourself. No sign-up necessary.
